00013 /**
00014  * The RenderObject class represents any entity in the game world which
00015  * will be rendered through the OgreScene manager (typically attached to
00016  * SceneNodes)
00017  */
00018 class RenderObject
00019 {
00020 private:
00021     /** The lowest integer value that is guaranteed to be unused as a render index */
00022     static int m_nextRenderId;
00023 
00024     /** The SceneManager that should be used to manage OGRE resources */
00025     SceneManager * mp_mgr;
00026 
00027     /** An integer identifier which is unique to this instance of RenderObject */
00028     int m_renderId;
00029 
00030 public:
00031     /** Constructs a new RenderObject which uses the specified SceneManager */
00032     RenderObject(SceneManager * mgr);
00033 
00034     /** @return The OGRE scene manager used to manage resources for this object */
00035     SceneManager * getSceneManager();
00036 
00037     /** @return The unique render identifier of this RenderObject */
00038     int renderId() const;
00039 
00040     /** Updates the entities effects based on passed time and camera orientation (useful for sprites) */
00041     virtual void updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation) = 0;
00042 
00043     /**  Loads any resources (sprites, particles, etc) that will be neccesary to render the entity. */
00044     virtual void loadSceneResources() = 0;
00045 
00046     /** Performs first time creation of required OGRE effects */
00047     virtual void createEffects() = 0;
00048 
00049     /** Performs destruction of all generated OGRE effects */
00050     virtual void destroyEffects() = 0;
00051 
00052     /** @return True if the passed RenderObject has the same render id */
00053     bool operator==(const RenderObject &other) const;
00054 };
00055 
00056 /**
00057  * The ConstraintRenderObject represents the graphical representation
00058  * of a Constraint physics object */
00059 class ConstraintRenderObject : public RenderObject
00060 {
00061 private:
00062     /** The constraint object to render */
00063     Constraint * mp_constraint;
00064     
00065     /** SceneNode to anchor effects to */
00066     SceneNode * mp_node;
00067 
00068     /** Particle system for rope effect */
00069     ParticleSystem * mp_particle;
00070 
00071     /** Static flag to ensure resources are loaded only once */
00072     static bool m_resourcesLoaded;
00073 public:
00074     /** Constructs a new PhysicsRenderObject */
00075     ConstraintRenderObject(Constraint * constraint, SceneManager * mgr);
00076 
00077     /** @return A pointer to the model object */
00078     Constraint * getConstraint();
00079 
00080     /** #see RenderObject::updateEffects() */
00081     virtual void updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation);
00082 
00083     /** @see RenderObject::loadSceneResources() */ 
00084     virtual void loadSceneResources();
00085 
00086     /** @see RenderObject::createEffects() */ 
00087     virtual void createEffects();
00088 
00089     /** @see RenderObject::destroyEffects() */ 
00090     virtual void destroyEffects();
00091 };

00094 /**
00095  * A PhysicsRenderObject represents a single logical object from the game model
00096  * that should be rendered to screen.
00097  */
00098 class PhysicsRenderObject : public RenderObject
00099 {
00100 private:
00101     /** A pointer to the model object */
00102     SphereCollisionObject * mp_object;
00103 
00104 public:
00105     /** Constructs a new PhysicsRenderObject */
00106     PhysicsRenderObject(SphereCollisionObject * object, SceneManager * mgr);
00107 
00108     /** @return A pointer to the model object */
00109     SphereCollisionObject * getObject();
00110 
00111     /** Updates the node based on passed time and camera orientation (useful for sprites) */
00112     virtual void updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation) = 0;
00113 
00114     /** @see RenderObject::loadSceneResources() */ 
00115     virtual void loadSceneResources() = 0;
00116 
00117     /** @see RenderObject::createEffects() */ 
00118     virtual void createEffects() = 0;
00119 
00120     /** @see RenderObject::destroyEffects() */ 
00121     virtual void destroyEffects() = 0;
00122 
00123     /** @see RenderObject::operator==() */
00124     bool operator==(const RenderObject &other) const;
00125 };

00128 /**
00129  * The ShipRO (ShipRenderObject) class manages the graphical representation
00130  * of any instance of a SpaceShip (human or player controlled)
00131  */
00132 class ShipRO : public PhysicsRenderObject
00133 {
00134 private:
00135     /** The game object represented by this render object */
00136     SpaceShip * mp_spaceShip;
00137 
00138     /** The scene node to anchor effects onto */
00139     SceneNode * mp_shipNode;
00140 
00141     /** 
00142      * The scene node which rotates to face the same direction as the
00143      * represented game object.
00144      */
00145     SceneNode * mp_shipRotateNode;
00146     Entity * mp_shipEntity;
00147     Light * mp_spotLight;
00148     Light * mp_pointLight;
00149     ParticleSystem * mp_engineParticles;
00150 
00151     static bool m_resourcesLoaded;
00152 public:
00153     ShipRO(SpaceShip * ship, SceneManager * mgr);
00154 
00155     /** @return The SpaceShip game object represented by this entity */
00156     SpaceShip * ship() const;
00157 
00158     /** Updates the node based on passed time and camera orientation (useful for sprites) */
00159     virtual void updateEffects(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation);
00160 
00161     /** @see RenderObject::loadSceneResources() */ 
00162     virtual void loadSceneResources();
00163 
00164     /** @see RenderObject::createEffects() */ 
00165     virtual void createEffects();
00166 
00167     /** @see RenderObject::destroyEffects() */ 
00168     virtual void destroyEffects();
00169 };

00227 /**
00228  * The RenderModel stores the complete list of RenderObjects that should be rendered each frame
00229  * for a scene.
00230  */
00231 class RenderModel : public GameArenaListener
00232 {
00233 private:
00234     /** Reference to the GameArena object that should be observed */
00235     GameArena & m_model;
00236 
00237     /** List of all PhysicsRenderObjects that should be updated and rendered each frame */
00238     std::vector<PhysicsRenderObject * > m_physicsRenderList;
00239 
00240     std::vector<ConstraintRenderObject * > m_constraintRenderList;
00241 
00242     /** The SceneManager for the scene represented by the RenderModel */
00243     SceneManager * mp_mgr;
00244 
00245 public:
00246     /**
00247      * Constructs a RenderModel which observes the specified GameArena, and creates
00248      * scene nodes through the passed SceneManager.
00249      */
00250     RenderModel(GameArena& model, SceneManager * mgr);
00251 
00252     /** Calls the updateEffects() method of all RenderObjects stored in the RenderModel's render list */
00253     void updateRenderList(Real elapsedTime, Quaternion camOrientation);
00254 
00255     /** Called whenever a new GameObject is created by the observed GameArena */
00256     virtual void newGameObject(GameObject * object);
00257 
00258     /** Called whenever a GameObject is destroyed by the observed GameArena */
00259     virtual void destroyedGameObject(GameObject * object);
00260 
00261     /** Called whenever a new Constraint is generated in the GameArena */
00262     virtual void newConstraint(Constraint * object);
00263 
00264     /** Called just before a Constraint is destroyed in the GameArena */
00265     virtual void destroyedConstraint(Constraint * object);
00266 
00267     int getNumObjects() const;
00268 };
